thread.title: Relive the craziest 24 hours in the life of roly poly Sutton United goalkeeper Wayne Shaw
thread.title_full: Relive the craziest 24 hours in the life of roly poly Sutton United goalkeeper Wayne Shaw

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Relive the craziest 24 hours in the life of roly poly Sutton United goalkeeper Wayne Shaw
text:
Relive the craziest 24 hours in the life of roly poly Sutton United goalkeeper Wayne Shaw From zero to hero and back again - this could be a film Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Sutton United manager disappointment over pie controversy Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
It's been a crazy 24 hours for former Sutton United goalkeeper Wayne Shaw. 
In the build up to Arsenal's FA Cup fifth round tie there was almost as much focus on the larger than life goalkeeper as there was on the game. 
Especially when Alan Shearer recalled the time he used to play alongside Shaw in Southampton's academy. 
And it's safe to say the big shot-stopper didn't shy away from his big moment. 
At around 21.30 on Monday, Shaw ate a pie in Sutton United's dugout. At around 16.00 on Tuesday, Shaw resigned. 
Relive Shaw's crazy 24 hours below: 16.00 - Shaw hoovers Sutton's dugout in preparation for the big game (Photo: GETTY) 19.00 - Teamsheets released, Shaw confirmed as substitute (Photo: REUTERS) 19.55 - Takes place on Sutton United bench (Photo: REUTERS) 20.45 - Spotted in the bar at half-time 21.05 - Applauds Arsenal fans singing "Fatty, give us a wave" (Photo: REUTERS) 21.30 - Eats pie on subs bench (Photo: BBC) 21.50 - Watches his side lose 2-0 to Arsenal (Photo: Rex Features) 07.00 - Makes appearance on Good Morning Britain (Photo: Rex Features) 09.30 - Sutton boss Paul Doswell slams Shaw over pie-eating stunt (Photo: PA) 12.30 - Shaw approached by Morrisons to become official 'pie-taster' (Photo: PA) 13.30 - Shaw subject of FA investigation over breaking betting rules (Photo: BBC) 15.55 - Sutton United request resignation from Shaw (Photo: Mike Hewitt/Getty Images) 16.00 - Shaw resigns from position (Photo: BBC Sport)
